column1: Table 327-0046 New housing price indexes, monthly (index, 2007=100)(2)

column2: Data for periods prior to January 2007 were calculated by linking 1997=100 data (see CANSIM table 327-0005) to the average of the 12 months of 2007.

In order to ensure data confidentiality, the following census metropolitan areas and census agglomerations are grouped together as follows: Saint John, Fredericton and Moncton; Toronto and Oshawa; and Greater Sudbury and Thunder Bay.

column1: Statistics Canada. Table 327-0046 - New housing price indexes, monthly (index, 2007=100)
